content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### First Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)

### Second Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position 2.0, 0.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace. For example, you encountered errors when trying to insert iron ore and coal into the furnaces without having them available in your inventory.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Be aware of the furnace status before extracting items. If the furnace result is full, you will not be able to extract more items until some are removed.

### Errors when using resources
- When harvesting resources, ensure you are aware of the nearest resource positions to minimize travel time and maximize efficiency.
